title: The Apollo Program - NASA
abstract: Overview of the NASA Apollo program goals, the role of Saturn rockets, and a brief mention of issues encountered.

title: Apple - Wikipedia
abstract: Overview of the apple, its origin in Central Asia, domestication, spread via the Silk Road, cultivation worldwide, and cultural significance.

title: A Brief History of Apples - Vermont Tree Fruit Growers Association
abstract: Brief history of apples, their ancient origins, introduction to North America by European colonists, and the story of Johnny Appleseed.

title: Origins of Apples | NC Historic Sites
abstract: Details the origin of apples in Kazakhstan, their spread to Europe by 1500 BC, and cultivation by Greeks, Etruscans, and Romans.

title: Exploring the origins of the apple | ScienceDaily
abstract: Research reveals apple origins linked to ancient megafauna and Silk Road trade, challenging traditional domestication models and highlighting the role of hybridization.

title: Apple | Description, Cultivation, Domestication, Varieties, Uses, Nutrition, & Facts | Britannica
abstract: Comprehensive overview of the apple, covering its history, domestication, physical characteristics, cultivation requirements, varieties, and uses.

title: Global top apple producing countries 2022/23| Statista
abstract: Statista data on global apple production in 2022/23, highlighting China as the leading producer, followed by the European Union and the United States, and noting increasing global fruit production trends.

title: List of countries by apple production - Wikipedia
abstract: Wikipedia list of countries by apple production and area harvested, with data from FAOSTAT for 2019-2022, showing global production figures and top producing countries.

title: Apple Production by Country 2025 - World Population Review
abstract: Ranking of countries by apple production in 2022 from World Population Review, with data on top producers like China, Turkey, and the United States, and brief overviews of their apple industries.

title: Fresh Apple production and top producing countries - Tridge
abstract: Tridge data on Fresh Apple production, including top countries, production volume, and trends from 2008 to 2022, highlighting key production figures and growth rates.

title: Apple production - Our World in Data
abstract: Our World in Data page on apple production, providing metadata and source information for FAOSTAT data on apple production volume measured in tonnes.

title: Apple Trees That Thrive: Climate and Soil Compatibility – Grow Organic
abstract: Guide to growing apple trees, focusing on climate and soil compatibility, chill hours, soil pH, choosing varieties for different climates, sustainable practices, and planting instructions.

title: Apple trees - Appropedia, the sustainability wiki
abstract: Appropedia overview of apple trees, covering their origin, climate tolerance, physical description, life cycle, and pollination requirements.

title: Apple - Soil and Climate - NHB.gov.in
abstract: Details on ideal soil and climate conditions for apple cultivation, including soil type, pH, temperature ranges, winter rest, sunshine, altitude, and rainfall requirements, from NHB.gov.in.

title: How Long Does It Take Apple Trees To Produce: Factors Influencing Fruit Yield And Growth
abstract: Article discussing the timeline for apple tree fruit production, factors influencing growth (variety, soil, climate, water, pruning), care and maintenance tips, and common challenges like pests, diseases, and weather.

title: Apple Agronomic Principles | Yara United States
abstract: Detailed agronomic principles for apple cultivation from Yara United States, covering soil, water, rootstock, orchard systems, tree manipulation, crop protection, harvesting, and storage.

title: Apple Farming in Washington - HistoryLink.org
abstract: Detailed history of apple farming in Washington State, covering its origins, growth influenced by irrigation and railroads, marketing, labor systems, and the evolution of the industry to its modern state as the leading US apple producer.

title: Prime apple-growing areas in US face increasing climate risks | WSU Insider | Washington State University
abstract: WSU study on increasing climate risks in prime US apple regions, focusing on Washington State, analyzing metrics like extreme heat and chill portions, and discussing impacts on production and adaptation strategies.

title: Washington's Apple Industry: Navigating Water Management and Economic Challenges in the Yakima Basin -
abstract: Exploration of Washington's apple industry in the Yakima Basin, focusing on water management, economic challenges, sustainable practices, technological advancements, and the impact of climate change and labor issues.

title: Our Orchards & Apple Growers - Washington Apples
abstract: Overview of the five main apple growing regions in Washington State from Washington Apples, describing their locations, climate (arid), soil (nutrient-rich), and reliance on irrigation.

title: Expect Strong Washington Apple Crop - Produce Business
abstract: Produce Business article on the Washington apple crop forecast, highlighting production increase, popular varieties like Cosmic Crisp and SweeTango, organic sales growth, and challenges including rising labor costs and retail strategies.
